transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Salaam alekum.
Customer: Haan, meri baat suniye.
Executive: Haan, very good afternoon sir.
Customer: Rajeev Mishra baat kar raha hu India Mart se baat hui thi. Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji. 2:00 baje bola tha.
Executive: To basically kya aapne baat kari unse? Kirti mam se baat kari?
Customer: Haan, Kirti mam se maine bataya tha ki call karne ke liye wo thoda bahut busy schedule chal raha hai par abhi main line pe le leta hu unko.
Executive: Line le liya aapne?

Executive: Suno, sir aap Kirti mam ko number pe call kar lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay ji. Accha ek baat aur aapse kehna tha. RFID hotel door lock ki buylead aayi thi 37 minute pehle Jamnagar Gujarat se 50 piece ke liye. Kisi ne dekha nahi tha kya?
Customer: Hmm. Nahi abhi dekha sir actually na calls pe chal rahe the hum log.
Executive: Accha. Theek hai.
Customer: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to talk to Kirti mam.

- Customer informs about RFID hotel door lock buylead.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to call Kirti mam on number.

- Executive informed about the buylead.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, call
